| HistoryText             =
==Origin==
With an increasing number in the student body in Xavier's school, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Paragon Squad was originally advised by [[Rahne Sinclair (Earth-616)|Wolfsbane]],{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #12}} and later advised by [[Amara Aquilla (Earth-616)|Magma]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #15}}{{r|New X-Men: Academy X Yearbook #1}}

[[File:Paragons Squad (Earth-616) from New X-Men Vol 2 12 0002.jpg|thumb|left|The Paragons with their original advisor.]]

==Academy X==
After the truth about [[Rahne Sinclair (Earth-616)|Wolfsbane]] and [[Joshua Foley (Earth-616)|Elixir]]'s brief affair was exposed, Wolfsbane left the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|X-Mansion]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #12}} The squad was briefly combined with the [[Alpha Squadron (Earth-616)|Alpha Squadron]] under the supervision of [[Xi'an Coy Manh (Earth-616)|Karma]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #14}} Just before the end of the term, [[Amara Aquilla (Earth-616)|Magma]] assumed the leadership of the squad.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #15}}{{r|New X-Men: Academy X Yearbook #1}}

==Members==
* [[Mark Sheppard (Earth-616)|DJ]] - Mark Sheppard converted different types of music into various forms of energy. Depowered, and killed in bus bombing by [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|Purifiers]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #24}} 
* [[Ben Hammil (Earth-616)|Match]] - Ben Hamill is pyrokinetic and always engulfed in flames. Field Leader. Retained his powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Megan Gwynn (Earth-616)|Pixie]] - Megan Gwynn possesses rainbow colored wings mounted on her back for flight and emits a hallucinogenic dust. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Jessica Vale (Earth-616)|Preview]] - Jessica Vale had precognitive sight. Depowered, and killed in bus bombing by [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|Purifiers]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #24}} 
* [[Hope Abbott (Earth-616)|Trance]] - Hope Abbott can project an astral form. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Nicholas Gleason (Earth-616)|Wolf Cub]] - Nicholas Gleason had a lupine appearance, enhanced senses, and razor sharp claws. Retained his powers, but was later killed by [[Donald Pierce (Earth-616)|Donald Pierce]].{{r|Young X-Men #5}}

==M-Day==
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Paragons Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}
